snippet: An industrial designer who worked with Eames and Saarinen gives his first profession a second chance.
abstract: Charles Pollock, reclusive furniture designer whose first chair in nearly 30 years will be introduced at the International Contemporary Furniture Fair, talks about what it is like to return to design.
lead_paragraph: An industrial designer who worked with Eames and Saarinen gives his first profession a second chance.

headline.seo: Talking With Charles Pollock, Furniture Designer — Q&A
headline.main: Charles Pollock on Coming Back to Furniture Design After a 30-Year Hiatus
headline.print_headline: Charles Pollock on Coming Back to Furniture Design After a 30-Year Hiatus
